column4: HI, I need some program to conversion from mp4 or flv to mp3 with gui, is something ?
try arista or transmageddon.  They're as good places as any to start.
Handbrake does just about everything, but isn't in the repos (IIRC).
You've had five or six responses, but you just keep going "help me, I need x" - read the responses and you'll be fine.
